'''Gambler's Feather Accessory''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Gambler]].

==Description==
This colorful feather served to decorate a gambler's hat. Its flamboyance disgusts true aristocrats.<br />But what the aristocrats do not see is the delicate mechanism hidden beneath the surface.<br />When the time comes, the gambler subtly swaps in a hidden, game-changing card.<br />Upon seeing this card, the disdain and condescension on the aristocrats' faces would instantly give way to sheer shock.
